resources.string: RefugeePDF
Yes
No
Has any person named in question 2 been charged with any offence that is currently awaiting legal action?
Has any person named in question 2 been convicted of an offence in any country (including any conviction which is now removed from official records)?
Has any person named in question 2 been the subject of an arrest warrant or interpol notice?
Has any person named in question 2 been found guilty of a sexually based offence involving a child (including where no conviction was recorded)?
Has any person named in question 2 been named on a sex offender register?
Has any person named in question 2 been acquitted of any offence on the grounds of unsoundness of mind or insanity?
Has any person named in question 2 been found by a court not fit to plead?
Has any person named in question 2 been directly or indirectly involved in, or associated with, activities which would represent a risk to national security in Australia or any other country?

Has any person named in question 2 been charged with, or indicted for: genocide, war crimes, crimes against humanity, torture, slavery, or any other crime that is otherwise of a serious international concern?
Has any person named in question 2 been associated with a person, group or organisation that has been/is involved in criminal conduct?

Has any person named in question 2 been associated with an organisation engaged in violence or engaged in acts of violence (including war, insurgency, freedom fighting, terrorism, protest) either overseas or in Australia?
Has any person named in question 2 served in a military force, police force, state sponsored/private militia or intelligence agency (including secret police)?
Has any person named in question 2 undergone any military/paramilitary training, been trained in weapons/explosives or in the manufacture of chemical/biological products?
Has any person named in question 2 been involved in people smuggling or people trafficking offences?
Has any person named in question 2 been removed, deported or excluded from any country (including Australia)?
Has any person named in question 2 overstayed a visa in any country (including Australia)?
Has any person named in question 2 had any outstanding debts to the Australian Government or any public authority in Australia?
